transcripts.transcript_text: Speaker A: To the Tesco Mobile voicemail service. The person you're calling.
Speaker A: Call has been forwarded to voicemail. The person you're trying to reach is not available. At the tone, please record your message. When you have finished recording, you may hang up.
Speaker A: Call has been forwarded to voicemail. The person.
Speaker A: To the Tesco Mobile voicemail service. The person you're calling is unable to take your call. Please leave your message after the tone. To record your message again, press at any time.
Speaker A: Your call has been forwarded to voicemail.
